alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 05 at 12:36AM AKDT until October 06 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations around 6 inches. South wind gusts to 25 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range, Trims Camp and south. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to noon AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of visibility reduction in blowing and falling snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A front is moving northward into the area beginning late this morning. Heaviest snowfall is expected to begin this afternoon and last until noon Friday. Snow could linger through Friday night but should be lighter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
